userAgentFormat: r/{subreddit} sidebar updater. (Contact us via r/{subreddit} modmail)

moderation.removalPrefixFormat: Thank you for your submission to /r/{subreddit}! Unfortunately, it was removed for the following reason:
moderation.removalSuffixFormat: Please [message the moderators](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=%2Fr%2F{subreddit}) if you have any questions.
moderation.lfgRemovalDescriptionFormat:
LFG/LFT and related posts are not allowed as individual text posts on the subreddit.
To prevent the subreddit from being spammed with posts of players looking for teams or teammates, the subreddit runs a [**weekly thread**]({lfg_megathread_url}) which can be found in the banner. Please direct posts to that thread, /r/OverwatchLFT, or use external websites. Thanks!

megathreads.title: LFG: Find Players & Teams
megathreads.tweet: Looking for people or teams to play with? Recruiting? Check out our weekly #Overwatch LFG megathread! {url}

megathreads.title: Advice: Questions & VOD Reviews
megathreads.tweet: Got questions? Need gameplay reviewed? This week's Advice Megathread is the place: {url} #Overwatch
